name: WELTEN Institute
description_bullets: Conducted research on Inquiry Based Learning (IBL), aimed at providing better structural and managerial support for IBL processes through mobile, wearable and desktop based technology.
Responsible for DojoIBL: a GAE cloud-based solution to structure Collaborative Inquiry Based Learning processes.
Successful interdisciplinary collaborations in several European projects (weSPOT, ECO, LA4S & Elite), resulting in several scientific publications.
Areas of contribution: Inquiry Based Learning | Experimental Design | Software Engineering | DojoIBL | Statistical analysis in R | Learning Analytics | Machine Learning

name: WELTEN Institute
description: Interactive visualizations for ARLearn, a tool suite for educators and learners, which aims to enhance educational experience based on serious games. ARLearn provides functionality for both teachers and students.

name: Oviedo University
description: Gained experience in: web architecture, design patterns, web services, web security, web semantic, project management, usability, accessibility and adaptability.​​

name: Oviedo University
description: Gained basic knowledge and experience about transversal topics related to Computer Science like mathematics, algorithms and logic.​​
